ygData.subject: Re: Wizards are fun !
ygData.msgSnippet: FLAME FLAME FLAME *yeash you give us a bad name* I don t like your tactics and I would harass you till you quit if you did that too me, but to each his own.
ygData.messageBody:
FLAME FLAME FLAME

*yeash you give us a bad name*

I don't like your tactics and I would harass you till you quit if you did
that too me, but to each his own. All I have to say is to the others that
just read this... Please don't do this. His actions are exactly why we can
never find a group. He is propagating his own problems. If your in a group
with this happening might I suggest one thing. Line your self up opposite
the stealer and cast your weakest shock spell on a non engaged MOB that is a
helper to the one that your stealer is fighting (another bandit) and zap...
the bandit will tag your stealer on his way to you and your stealer has two
nasties he has to deal with) (I apologize ahead of time but I was very mad
at this post)

Rutreeii
Cazic-Thul

----- Original Message -----
From: <yur@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 4:01 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Wizards are fun !


> From: yur@...
>
>
>
> I probably will get flamed for this for sure, but who cares.
>
> I made it all the way to lvl 12 as an erudite wizard. I found that
leveling
> was very slow indeed and it was getting really boring camping with my
groups
> till the sun comes up. However, i was on a few days ago in the morning
and my
> regular group wasn't on. I shouted for about 30 min and no one wanted to
join
> up with me for bandit hunting. Out of boredom, i went down to the bandit
camps
> to see if i can find a group there(West karanas on top of Hill). I found
this
> group of 6 there camping the bandits so i just sat around shouting for
groups
> once again. But while those guys were fighting the bandits, i thought, hey
might
> as well try to see if i can kill one solo, if i can't, then they will
probably
> help me anyways. I attacked one bandit and killedh im in 3 shots with
Shock of
> Lightning. and WOW ! so much XP !!! so i just kept going. I got around
10-15
> pp in 30 min and gained 1 bubble of xp. normall i gain 1 bubble in 6-8
hours of
> playing. FINALLY ! i found how to have fun with my wizard and not be the
lamer
> that spent all his time trying to group and get shitty XP cuz of the split
> between members !! who cares if they think i am a kill stealer, its not
like
> they can do anything about it HAHAHA. too bad for them that they wont
group
> with me. I also found some wizards are really stupid, the group of 6 i
was
> stealing from had a lvl 14 wizard and a lvl 11 wizard. and none of them
could
> stop me from stealing. its odd but true... ppl just don't think.. oh
well.. i
> hope you all try to just have fun and not give a shit what other ppl think
for
> once. then you might find why Varent say we are a balanced race, i
personally
> think we were made to give grief to others heehhe.. j/k I personally
think we
> should be changed to Erudite Magical Theives hehe..
>
>
>
